transport.name: HttpPoll-Sample
transport.description: Sample HTTP transport that extends the basic HTTP transport.

propertyDefinition.label: Param Name for Last Poll Timestamp
propertyDefinition.description: Param Name for Last Poll Timestamp

propertyDefinition.label: Initial Last Timestamp
propertyDefinition.description: The last timestamp for the initial poll. A valid timestamp has to confrom the timestamp format string. If left empty or entered an invalid value, January 1, 1970 (midnight UTC/GMT) will be used.

propertyDefinition.label: Timestamp Format String
propertyDefinition.description:
Input and output dates will use this format. Date Format is specified using standard Java conventions:
G - Era designator.
y - Year.
M - Month in year.
w - Week in year.
W - Week in month.
D - Day in year.
d - Day in month.
F - Day of week in month.
E - Day in week.
a - Am/pm marker.
H - Hour in day (0-23).
k - Hour in day (1-24).
K - Hour in am/pm (0-11).
h - Hour in am/pm (1-12).
m - Minute in hour.
s - Second in minute.
S - Millisecond.
z - Time zone (General time zone).
Z - Time zone (RFC 822 time zone)
